Name: La Bouche Reelle (The Real Mouth)
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (discarded) & orange wedge.
Review: Bittersweet and citrusy over a backbone of cognac and bourbon.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Danny wilson at Tabouche, Cambridge, England.
